This is a test

Jan 01 2018 python  machine-learning 

Programmers from other languages may not familiar with the word pythonic and its meaning. Basically, each programming language follows a particular coding style. Over the years, the Python community has come to use the adjective pythonic to describe the code that follows its own style.

Blockquotes are very handy in email to emulate reply text. This line is part of the same quote.

  a = tf.constant(5, name='alpha')
  W = tf.Variable(tf.random_uniform([1, 2], -1.0, 1.0), name='weights')
  b = tf.Variable(tf.zeros([1]), name='biases')
